Uses of Interface
io.github.ai4ci.abm.riskmodel.ConvolutionFilter

Packages that use ConvolutionFilter
Package
Description
io.github.ai4ci.abm.riskmodel
Bayesian risk estimation models for individual infectious probability assessment.

  • Uses of ConvolutionFilter in io.github.ai4ci.abm.riskmodel

    Methods in io.github.ai4ci.abm.riskmodel that return ConvolutionFilter
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static ConvolutionFilter
    ConvolutionFilter.empty()
    Create an empty ConvolutionFilter instance with zero offset and an empty kernel density array.
    static ConvolutionFilter
    ConvolutionFilter.from(int offset, double... values)
    Create a ConvolutionFilter instance from the given offset and kernel density values.
    static ConvolutionFilter
    ConvolutionFilter.from(KernelFunction kfn)
    Create a ConvolutionFilter instance from the given KernelFunction.
    ConvolutionFilter
    RiskModel.getContactsKernel()
    The contacts kernel is used to weight the contribution of past contacts to current risk.
    ConvolutionFilter
    RiskModel.getSymptomKernel()
    The symptom kernel is used to weight the contribution of symptom evidence over time.
    ConvolutionFilter
    RiskModel.getTestKernel()
    The test kernel is used to weight the contribution of test evidence over time, accounting for delays in test results.
    default ConvolutionFilter
    ConvolutionFilter.scale(double factor)
    Scale the kernel density values by a given factor, returning a new ConvolutionFilter instance with the same offset and scaled density values.
    static ConvolutionFilter
    ConvolutionFilter.square(int offset, int length)
    Create a ConvolutionFilter instance representing a square kernel with the specified offset and length.
